pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 1, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 1, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Orientation Event for Summer Students and hold a Q&A with students.

Webcast links:
English - http://video.isilive.ca/csps/2017-06-01/english.html
French - http://video.isilive.ca/csps/2017-06-01/francais.html
Floor (as spoken) - http://video.isilive.ca/csps/2017-06-01/floor.html

Closed to media.
